name: GameInfo
0:
”Alexa, open game info”
”Recommend me a video game”
”Alexa, tell game info find me info about Watchdog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game info
des:
Are you looking for a new video game to play? Need some recommendations?

Game Info skill wants to help you to find your next video game. It is able to recommend video games for different platforms, e.g. Playstation 4, Xbox, etc, based on genres you are interested in. 

Start by saying:
"Alexa, recommend a video game"

You can also get information of a specific video game. 
Try asking:
"Alexa, find me info about <game name>"

Enjoy!!!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
